title: Add tests that execute tasks compiled for .net 3.5 or lower
body:
Would help to know when we regress backwards compatibility with old tasks.

The task could also call methods from the orcas engine, like Engine.Version. An internal test doing this had actually found a bug:
https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DevDiv/MSBuild/_workitems/index?id=286389&triage=true&_a=edit
